sentences.en: a collar and cuffs of white lace
sentences.cn: 带白色蕾丝花边的衣领和袖口

sentences.en: a handkerchief trimmed with lace
sentences.cn: 饰有蕾丝花边的手绢

sentences.en: a pair of lace-ups
sentences.cn: 一双系带鞋

sentences.en: a tablecloth edged with lace
sentences.cn: 镶有花边的桌布

sentences.en: Barry was sitting on the bed, tying the laces of an old pair of running shoes.
sentences.cn: 巴里正坐在床上系一双旧跑鞋的鞋带。

sentences.en: He was wearing black lace-up shoes.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一双黑色系带鞋。

sentences.en: Her blouse has a ruffle of lace around the neck.
sentences.cn: 她的衬衫领子镶有褶裥花边.

sentences.en: I am wearing a plaid nightgown trimmed with white lace.
sentences.cn: 我穿着一件带有白色蕾丝花边的格子呢睡衣。

sentences.en: lace curtains
sentences.cn: 网眼窗帘

sentences.en: Lace up your shoes or you’ll trip over.
sentences.cn: 把鞋带系好，否则你会绊倒的。

sentences.en: Lace your boots firmly or the lace will come undone.
sentences.cn: 把你的靴子系紧,不然鞋带会松开.

sentences.en: laced into me for arriving so late.
sentences.cn: 数落我的迟到

sentences.en: Marion laced into the gin and tonic as if it was going out of fashion.
sentences.cn: 马里恩抨击杜松子加汤尼汽水，似乎它即将过时。

sentences.en: She finally found the perfect gown, a beautiful creation trimmed with lace.
sentences.cn: 她终于找到了理想的礼服——一袭饰有蕾丝的美丽长裙。

sentences.en: She let a piece of lace into her dress.
sentences.cn: 她在衣服上镶了一块花边.

sentences.en: She wore a white satin gown trimmed with lace.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条饰有蕾丝花边的白色缎子长裙.

sentences.en: Slip-on shoes are easier to put on than lace-ups.
sentences.cn: 一脚蹬比系带鞋容易穿。

sentences.en: The bride is wearing a wedding dress made of lace.
sentences.cn: 新娘穿一件蕾丝婚纱.

sentences.en: The nightdress has handmade lace round the armholes and neckline.
sentences.cn: 这件女式睡衣的袖孔和领口都镶着一圈手织花边。

sentences.en: Wear well-fitting, lace-up shoes with soft uppers.
sentences.cn: 穿合脚的、系带的软帮鞋。

sentences.en: Your boot lace is untied.
sentences.cn: 你靴子上的鞋带松了。

words.tran_cn: 有花边的；绑带子的；加酒的
用带子束紧；交织在一起；抽打（lace的过去分词）
用带子束紧；交织在一起；抽打（lace的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 蕾丝，透孔织品，鞋带，系带
trans.tran_en: a fine cloth made with patterns of many very small holes
to fasten something by tying a lace

trans.tran_cn: 给（书、讲话等）润色，给（饮料等）掺（少量的酒、药、毒药等），给（鞋、靴等）穿鞋带，使编织（或交织、缠绕）在一起
trans.tran_en: to fasten something by tying a lace
